plot: A scientist at a Florida university inadvertantly creates a &"rage virus&" while performing experiments intended to restore dead brain tissue in baboons. When a journalist for the college paper breaks into the campus lab, he's bitten by one of the infected baboons; the virus soon spreads to a trio of rapists and a valley girl, all of whom go on killing sprees.   Written by  Jojo Mac
title: Furia Primitiva
